posts.title: WD-40 Flexible EZ Reach Straw
posts.content: This flexible EZ reach straw makes spraying WD-40 in hard-to-reach places more convenient than ever. This sturdy eight inch long hose can be positioned in virtually any angle and can either be set to a steady stream or spray depending on the cap’s placement.

posts.title: Cat Paw Doorstop
posts.content: Keep a feline friend close by at all times when you prop the door in your home using this cat paw doorstop. It’s made from a tough rubber material designed to stand up to heavy use while providing a laugh or two for everyone that comes across it.

posts.title: Endangered Species Erasers
posts.content: The endangered species eraser demonstrates that making mistakes can sometimes be a good thing, at least for the planet. The erasers are shaped like various endangered species as a means to raise awareness with a percentage of the purchase donated to the cause.

posts.title: Chalk Markers
posts.content: Create vivid and colorful works of art without creating a cloud of dust when using these chalk markers. Unlike traditional markers, these utilize a specialized liquid that won’t run or drip and can easily be cleaned up with a damp cloth once it’s time to erase.

posts.title: Smartphone Connected Video Doorbell
posts.content: See who’s knocking at your door even if you’re half way across town by using this smartphone connected video doorbell. It comes with built-in two-way communication, night vision, motion detection, and can be accessed using any smartphone or tablet.

posts.title: Microwave Bacon Rack
posts.content: Cook up bacon faster than ever with the microwave bacon rack that allows you to prepare bacon like never before. This wonderful tool lets you to hang multiple delicious strips of bacon so they cook in the air and not in the grease. The same great taste with less fat!

posts.title: Edible Stick On Eyes
posts.content: Make healthy snacks for kids by anthropomorphizing them with a pair of edible stick on eyes. These completely edible googley eyes come in a set that features a variety of entertaining expressions that make eating a delight.

posts.title: Caramel Apple Topping Station
posts.content: Bring a carnival favorite to a kitchen near you by making some delicious snacks with this caramel apple topping station. It features a 16 ounce melting pot at the center that’s perfect for your caramel or chocolate and comes with 6 topping trays and 4 decorating trays that spin.

posts.title: Double Flip Quadrocopter
posts.content: Perform mind-boggling aerial stunts effortlessly when you take to the skies with the double flip quadrocopter. This easy to pilot quadrocopter features vibrant LEDs perfect for night flying, performing single and double flips with the push of a button.

posts.title: Spring Assisted Nutcracker
posts.content: Entertain onlookers while you bust a nut like never before using this spring assisted nutcracker. After placing your nut on the small stainless steel plate, place the spring over it, lift and release it to crack the tough exterior.

posts.title: Crafting With Cat Hair Book
posts.content: Take the first step towards becoming a crazy cat lady by purchasing the “Crafting With Cat Hair” book. This fully illustrated read expertly guides you every step of the way so you can transform your kitty’s excess hair into creepy works of art.

posts.title: Sasquatch Poop
posts.content: Experience heaven on Earth by satisfying your sweet tooth with a hearty bag of Sasquatch poop. Each little cotton pouch comes filled with small chocolate covered almond poop balls that were hand-gathered from the forests of the Northwest where Bigfoot roams free.
